main event: A 15-year-old student observed a bright unidentified object with red domes in Waterbury, Connecticut on March 29, 1967.
interesting points: The object had a dome at the bottom and top and appeared white with red lights,The object blinked off and on approximately every five seconds,The observation was made from a second-floor window while the weather was clear and mild,The object traveled south and occasionally paused or disappeared,The student was accompanied by another observer, Stanley Borowy.
sighted object: a bright light with red domes
